name: Ngepet: The Untold Story
description:
Game Ngepet : The Untold Story is a game set in an urban story about the stealth of a wild boar or known as a "Babi Ngepet" who steals the property of local residents. You will play as a "Babi Ngepet" named Hendra.

Connection : Offline solo playing 
Genre : Hide and Seek

Team and Jobdesk
Game Designer - Dhimas 
Level Designer - Agung
UI Designer - Senayan
3D Enviroment Designer - Agung
3D Character - Naufal
Programmer - Aga
Sound Engginer - Aga
